content: you can help support more free patterns by purchasing the ad free written pdf pattern link to free tutorial is above & at the bottom of this description pdf patter and video tutorial included in this tutorial will teach you how to make a crochet sweater top this one of the simplest crochet top that i have created so far if you can make a granny square then you can do this even if you can t i will take you step by step in creating this crochet sweater adjustment for size given throughout the video poc woc
